mapper.select: select count(*) from sys_dispatch_list where DAY(create_date) = DAY(#{date})
select count(*) from sys_dispatch_list where DAY(end_date) = DAY(#{date})
select count(*) from sys_dispatch_list where status = 1
select count(*) from sys_dispatch_list where status = 3

select CONCAT(cb.no,'-',cbu.no,'-',cbue.room_number) as room_name,uv.name,uv.tel,ur.name as invite_name,uv.expected_visit_date,uv.visit_date from user_visitors as uv,cpm_building_unit_estate as cbue,cpm_building_unit as cbu,cpm_building as cb,user_resident as ur where uv.building_unit_estate_id = cbue.id and cbue.building_unit_id = cbu.id and cbu.building_id = cb.id and uv.invite_people_id = ur.id
select type,status,content,create_date from sys_advice where is_delete = 1 and status = 3
select title,content,status,release_date from sys_announcement_management where status = 2
select count(*) from cpm_building
select count(*) from cpm_building_unit_estate where is_delete = 1
select count(*) from cpm_building_unit_estate where is_delete = 1 and status in (1,5)
select count(*) from cpm_parking_space
select count(*) from cpm_parking_space where status = 1
select count(*) from cpm_parking_space where status = 2
select count(distinct code) from user_car
select count(*) from user_resident where type = 1
select count(*) from user_resident where type = 3

select sum(total_price) from sys_daily_payment as sdp,sys_charges_template_detail as sctd where sdp.charges_template_detail_id = sctd.id and YEAR(sdp.begin_date) = YEAR(#{date}) and sctd.marker = 1

select sum(paid_price) from sys_daily_payment as sdp,sys_charges_template_detail as sctd where sdp.charges_template_detail_id = sctd.id and sctd.marker = 1 and sdp.status = 3
select count(sdp.id) from sys_daily_payment as sdp,sys_charges_template_detail as sctd where sdp.charges_template_detail_id = sctd.id and sctd.marker = 1 and sdp.status = 1
select sum(payment_price) from sys_daily_payment as sdp,sys_charges_template_detail as sctd where sdp.charges_template_detail_id = sctd.id and sctd.marker = 1 and sdp.status = 1
